item.title: "not a statement"
item.dc:creator: @21_rush_12 21 rush 12
item.description:
@21_rush_12 wrote:

try adding this took it out of my client. past it over urs.

    [code]public void resetBank() {
	outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(53);
	outStream.writeWord(5382); // bank
	outStream.writeWord(playerBankSize); // number of items
     	for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) {
		if (bankItemsN[i] > 254) {
			outStream.writeByte(255);
			outStream.writeDWord_v2(bankItemsN[i]);
		} else {
			outStream.writeByte(bankItemsN[i]); //amount
		}
		if (bankItemsN[i] < 1)
			bankItems[i] = 0;
		if (bankItems[i] > 20000 || bankItems[i] < 0) {
			bankItems[i] = 20000;
		}
		outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(bankItems[i]); // itemID
	}
	outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: "not a statement"
item.dc:creator: @Wheaties Wheaties
item.description:
@Wheaties wrote:

public void resetBank() { outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(53); outStream.writeWord(5382); // bank outStream.writeWord(playerBankSize); // number of items for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { if (bankItemsN[i] > 254) { outStream.writeByte(255); outStream.writeDWord_v2(bankItemsN[i]); } else { outStream.writeByte(bankItemsN[i]); //amount } if (bankItemsN[i] < 1) bankItems[i] = 0; if (bankItems[i] > 20000 || bankItems[i] < 0) { bankItems[i] > 20000; } outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(bankItems[i]); // itemID } outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); }

Thats the whole void. So if anyone could tell me where to add/remove a bracket, please do.
